title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Designing Creative Soccer-Based Learning Environments Using Nonlinear Instructional Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three football instructional design frameworks based on nonlinear pedagogy (NLP) principles
Learners develop at least two digital tool-supported football learning environments that promote creativity development
Learners can operate football classes using PBL methods in real school settings and measure effectiveness through formative assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
